name: Callision
tag_list: cloud-communications, web-phone, click-to-call, customer-service, tech-support, browser-phone
overview:
A web-based “Click-to-Call” button that does not require anything except a microphone and speakers/headset. It allows businesses to be easily contacted directly from their web page in one click.

The button comes with a control panel that allows the owner to see detailed statistics for a particular button (calls, minutes, balance), see the buttons inventory (you can have multiple buttons of various types on different domains), and adjust the settings pertaining to the way calls are routed.

Features:

-Make calls to any US phone number directly from your control panel (no software required) -See all of the calls coming from the button real time (where it comes from, length of the conversation, destination) -Answer calls directly from the control panel (you just need a microphone and a headset) -Transfer calls by dragging them out of the active calls section and onto any phone number in the main section -Add as many numbers to the call routing section as you need, and group them any way you like -See the call history, sortable by time and date, source (e.g. the web site or page the call is coming from), and length of the conversation. -Find-Me/Follow-Me - select where the call will go first, the time this phone will ring, and where the call will be routed if it is not answered in the allotted time -You have a customizable Voice Mailbox as well - record the greeting and add it as the last step in your call routing section!
